list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having or relating to two poles or extremities.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a sharply bipolar division of affluent and underclass
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một phân chia lưỡng cực sắc sảo của những người giàu có và lớp dưới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of psychiatric illness) characterized by both manic and depressive episodes, or manic ones only.
(of a nerve cell) having two axons, one either side of the cell body.
(of a transistor or other device) using both positive and negative charge carriers.
